Hours of Operation

OFFICE HOURS ARE 8:30 AM THROUGH 4:30 PM, CLOSED FOR LUNCH 12:00 -1:00 PM

Geneology

PROBATE RECORDS BEGIN IN 1813 AND CAN BE VIEWED IN OUR OFFICE ON PUBLIC TERMINALS

THESE TERMINALS SHUT DOWN AT 4:00 PM.

OFFICE STAFF WILL NOT DO RECORD SEARCHES

Matters handled by the Harrison County Probate Court

Estates

Guardianships

Trusts

Civil Matters

Adoptions

Miscellaneous â€“ Change of Name on a minor/adult, Structured Settlements, Adult Protective Services, Minor Settlements, Register and Correction of Birth

Mental Illness

Marriage License (Application below)

MARRIAGE LICENSE - FOR THE HEALTH AND SAFETY OF EVERYONE, MARRIAGE LICENSE ARE BEING DONE BY APPOINTMENT ONLY. PLEASE CONTACT PROBATE COURT AT (740) 942-8868. IN ORDER TO EXPEDITE THE PROCESS, PLEASE COMPLETE THE APPLICATION IN ADVANCE BY CLICKING ON THE LINK BELOW. MARRIAGE APPLICATIONS ARE EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY, AND VALID FOR 60 DAYS.

REQUIREMENTS FOR MARRIAGE LICENSE:

One party must be a resident of Harrison County, Ohio (Out of State residents may apply, if getting married in Harrison County)

Confirmation Number from the on-line application (link below)

Copy of Divorce Decree (If previously married)

Copy of Death Certificate (If Widowed)

Current Drivers License

$42.00, Cash or Credit/Debit

Schedule an appointment!

Marriage License Application
